snippet: The Carlyle Group disclosed on Thursday that it had filled out its board with seven new members, and that it earned a healthy profit last year, as it prepares to go public within the next few months.
abstract: The Carlyle Group disclosed on Thursday that it had filled out its board with seven new members, and that it earned a healthy profit last year, as it prepares to go public within the next few months.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Expands Board and Reports 2011 Profit
